Room.Name: Sandy Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a sandy road connecting the beach area to Lelion Way.
Room.LongDescription: The road runs between high sand dunes on either side, making it difficult to see very far at times. When the winter storms lash this area, as they do every year, they shift the sand and often uncover things that washed ashore hundreds of years ago. In the pubs there has been talk of finding chests of jewels, and sometimes mysterious things with no apparent purpose.
